text: I came here out of curious. Had a pleasant surprise and am so happy that i ordered dry kuey teow chicken curry, char kuey teow and chicken rice set. All are so delicious and above my expectation. I will definitely be a refular customer here. Even the Kopi O Ais is perfecr.

Overall the food is nice, except the Teh O is not nice ( too “Xiap”)

The price is reasonable, and thankful for not having additional 10% service tax, especially in this area.

Loved the nasi Lemak. The sambal was just right, spicy yet not too sweet 🌶️🍲 Right now it would would I dare say it's my go-to nasi lemak in Iskandar Puteri.

My kids also enjoyed the Salted Egg Chicken. I had to sample some.

No regrets . Lovely sauce. Rich and generous ❤️🥚🍲🥚

I had the pleasure of visiting Local House Eco Botanic in Johor, and it was an amazing experience!

The location is perfect, nestled in the beautiful Eco Botanic area with peaceful atmosphere that truly enhances the dining experience. The environment is modern yet cozy, making it an ideal spot for both casual meals and special gatherings.

As for the food, it was absolutely delicious! The menu offers a variety of fresh and flavorful dishes that cater to different tastes. The ingredients are top-notch, and you can really taste the quality in each bite.

The staff were friendly and attentive, adding to the overall great service. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for an authentic local meal in a beautiful setting – 100% will be back again!

DO NOT COME HERE! 🥱 waiting for 1 hour for nasi goreng kampung sambal prawn 😬 the waiter ask if we can wait  10 minutes for the nasi lemak because they’re still cook 🤪suddenly ask again can change to white rice 🤣 but the service is good especially the boy who have eyes in his arm🤭very humble and kind guy keep apologise to us. after we change nasi lemak to nasi goreng kampung we have to wait for 1 hours to get our food ,better change your outlet name Local House to Local Slow. first and last 👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿
